context: Does anyone know if this will work with Windows 8?
response: I use Windows 8 and I love the mouse. By the way, any peripherals (Monitor, keyboard, mouse, speakers, etc) should work with any computer or operating system. The only setback would be if a wireless or bluetooth device needed drivers installed, which you would simply follow the instructions for the device. Operating system should never interfere. Hope this helps!

context: Is this program compatible with Windows Vista?
response: CFS3 was released for distribution in 2002. 2-3 years in the making, Windows Vista was released world-wide in 2007. There is a 5-year gap in the development and so the Vista platform is entirely different from that of the platform that runs CFS3. Conclusion: CFS3 will not or will run poorly on Vista.
